name: Blocky Air Force
description:
The funniest shooting pixel airplanes war game you ever tried!!

A game perfect for you if you love blocky-style games and the funny adventure of shooting flying warplanes.

Fun is guaranteed in a pixel blocky world where you will find many enemies trying to destroy your blocky plane.

Enjoy you are the super hero that world needs to conquer the skies

Choose your best hero and become the master in the sky!

Be careful: Sky is full of enemies flying and shooting you!

Get that all enemies fear your missiles and bullets!

Keep safe while flying and get the best score on ranking!

A new game of New Pixel Funny Games studio: The master of blocky arcade games.

∞∞∞∞ Blocky Air Force Features ∞∞∞∞

★ Pixel Shooty graphics
★ More of 20 heroes with planes!
★ Original soundtrack.
★ Pixel Shooter, bullets and missile with explosions!
★ High speed!
★ Free game!!

Download our new pixel airplanes war game and encourage to all your friends !
Play to see who get the best score in this blocky airplane survival game and share it!!

And don’t forget rate the game. Thank you very much for playing.
